data.name: Meta Horizon Worlds
data.description:
Welcome to Meta Horizon Worlds. Whether you are looking for community, games, events or everything in between, this is the place to be. With new worlds and quests launching all the time there is always something new to do. Meta Horizon Worlds is free so you can jump in right away.

• Explore epic games like Super Rumble and Citadel. Game face required.
• Unlock avatar rewards, stickers and more as you complete quests.
• Feel the pulse of live events, from concerts and thrilling sports to comedy. If you think you've got the talent, grab that mic and show your skills.
• Got a creative streak? Craft your own worlds where your friends can hang out.
• Jump in and join the community to connect with other players. 

Meta Horizon Worlds is open to 13+ in select countries and has parental supervision features for users 13-17 years old. Kindness and respect are key when interacting with others and everyone must abide by our Code of Conduct for Virtual Experiences.
